document_data.name: Silicon
document_data.mainbody: '''Silicon''' was an elemental substance found in the [[Realms]].

Availability.Occurrences: * [[Quartz]] was made up of silicon dioxide, as were its variants [[rose quartz]], [[amethyst]], [[cairngorm]], [[citrine]], [[iris agate]], [[morion (gem)|morion]], and [[chalcedony]].{{Cite dragon/248/Crystal Confusion|48}}

document_data.Usages:
* Silicon was used by the [[Netherese]] in building construction.
* [[Bronze]] alloys frequently included silicon impurities, which lowered the melting temperature.{{Cite dragon/123/Fire for Effect!|35}}
